name: Soccer Tournament
long_description: Experience the excitement of competitive soccer in our annual tournament. Teams of all ages and skill levels are welcome.

name: Swimming Championship
short_description: Dive into the pool at our swimming championship
long_description: Compete against swimmers from across the region in various swimming events. It's a great opportunity to showcase your aquatic skills.

name: Basketball Showcase
short_description: Show off your basketball skills in our showcase
long_description: Calling all basketball enthusiasts! Participate in our showcase event and demonstrate your basketball prowess. Open to all ages.

name: Tennis Open Championship
short_description: Compete in the Tennis Open Championship
long_description: Join the Tennis Open Championship and compete against top-level players. A great opportunity to test your skills.

name: Golf Tournament
short_description: Tee off at our annual golf tournament
long_description: Golf enthusiasts, join us for a day of friendly competition at our annual golf tournament. Prizes and refreshments provided.

name: Running Marathon
short_description: Participate in our charity running marathon
long_description: Run for a cause! Join our charity marathon and raise funds for a noble cause. All fitness levels are welcome.
